channel.description: Recent content in LLL on Siddartha's Blog

item.title: BSides Delhi CTF - 2020
item.description: This year my team c0d3_h4cki05_ got the opportunity to host BSides Delhi CTF. We organized the CTF on October 10th which is a 10 hour CTF (13.00 - 22.00 IST). Also this is a begginer friendly CTF. I’m happy that it went well. Yay! I authored three challenges for this CTF which are of difficulty ranging from easy, medium and hard. This blog post is to cover the intended solutions to all the 3 crypto challenges.
